website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Guide ISO 2 has plush cushioning with a great amount of stability. Though it received many satisfactory reviews, others could not help but compare it in favor of its predecessor. Most of the users admired the shoe’s design, durability, and stability features, but others found faults in its fit. Overall, the Guide ISO 2 is a comfortable shoe, but it still needs some improvements to achieve a completely praiseworthy performance.
pros: Most reviewers agreed that the Saucony Guide ISO 2 is a comfortable running shoe
Many wearers attested that the shoe provides great in-shoe feel
According to a few buyers, the Guide ISO 2 is very durable
it is made from top-notch materials
A few runners mentioned that the shoe has a really good stability feature
Some users admired the shoe ’s overall design and stylish construction
The shoe has a reasonable price tag
cons: One user experienced blister while wearing the shoe
A couple of runners felt that the shoe is a little too stiff to start
A few noticed the shoe has a weird fit
the forefoot is too narrow and the heel is too wide

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. All as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is totally fine. It's actually a comfy shoe to run in, but feels a bit wider in the toe that my previous Ride Saucony shoes. I made a slight purchase error (my fault), buying the Gide modem instead of the Ride (which is what I wanted). Due to stupid manufacturer naming, it's an easy mistake to make.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Gilly sprott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and superb price.
customer_reviews.text: I had already been fitted for an example of these trail shoes at a specialist running shop after gait analysis showed that I over pronate. These are identical and therefore suit me very well, they were also a much lower price so all round a great result.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Round

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery and very happy with the quality of the trainers. First few runs have gone well and the fit is spot on
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good comfortable running shoe that enables me to run some decent mileage confidently. A few sessions in and so far very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: John of Ashtead

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this style of Saucony trainers I have purchased. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martyn in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: brilliant trainer
customer_reviews.text: The trainer is perfect for someone with a pronation problem .This trainer makes your foot strike the ground correctly .
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Page

customer_reviews.title: Reliable training shoes. Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good training shoes. I retired a pair after 500km and used them to train for a marathon. They feel more comfortable than “fast” so you might want another pair for races or shorter distances
customer_reviews.author: Nicsanf

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them, they fit so well and are extremely comfy Had a older pair of Saucony which were very comfy but swapped to another brand and they just did not feel the same. First time of wearing smashed my PB for 10K which did make me smile. Worth every penny !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Great for me ! Bit extra support that I require based on running technique examination which removed my occasional knee issue. Excellent !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying quality, only a few months old and heel stitching has gone on both shoes, causing blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Hitchman

customer_reviews.title: My trainers
customer_reviews.text: I use these trainers for long runs I have always found them exactly what I need . And this pair are no different
customer_reviews.author: isobel crocker

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Guide Iso 2 Competition Running Shoes
